name: Post-Morphic SoundCloud
description:
A SoundCloud userstyle based on another userstyle, SoundCloud Pitch Black.

I made this based on a design aesthetic that I found and gave a name, called Post-Morphism.

It was created when flat design was just beginning to take off, around 2013 or so, and it was essentially just a toned down version of skeuomorphism. It utilizes very subtle gradients, shadows, and subtle gloss, with a "matte plastic" feel. Edging on flat design, similar to neumorphism, but less "squishy".

user.name: kantraa
